price: Moses said, “Do you say this about the truth after it has come to you? Can this be magic? But magicians will never succeed.”
arabic: قَالَ مُوسَىٰٓ أَتَقُولُونَ لِلۡحَقِّ لَمَّا جَآءَكُمۡۖ أَسِحۡرٌ هَٰذَا وَلَا يُفۡلِحُ ٱلسَّٰحِرُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
